channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Coming from the RAF Museum in Cosford, Shropshire, antiques experts Adam Partridge and Claire Rawle are on hand to find a selection of objects to take to auction. Claire gets sentimental over a music box and Adam discovers a silver cigarette case from Russia. Paul Martin falls for an iconic bike and visits the nearby historic Ironbridge to investigate the start of the industrial revolution.
